dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: My device stopped working this morning. The screen is black.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m sorry to hear that, Ms. Thompson. Let me help you troubleshoot it.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It won’t turn on no matter what I press.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Okay, let’s start by checking if it’s charged. Can you plug it in?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Yes, I already tried that. Still nothing.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Alright. Do you see any lights or hear any sounds when you press the power button?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: No. Completely dead.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Have you dropped it or exposed it to water recently?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: No, I’ve kept it safe.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Okay, let’s try holding the power and volume buttons for 20 seconds.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright… still nothing.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for trying. Let me check if it’s still under warranty.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It should be. I bought it less than a year ago.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I see here it was purchased 11 months ago. So it is under warranty.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Good. So can you just replace it?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We need to perform a few more checks before approving a replacement.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I don’t understand why. It’s clearly broken.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand, but this is part of our process. Let’s continue.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Do you have access to another charger to rule out a faulty cable?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Yes, I tried another cable already.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Alright, thanks for confirming. Let me escalate this to our technical team.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: How long will that take?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: It may take up to 3–5 business days for them to complete their review.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: That’s too long! I need this device working now.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand, and I’ll mark your case as urgent.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: You said that last time when I had a login issue too.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re right, Ms. Thompson. I’ll personally follow up on this daily.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Will someone come to pick it up?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Not yet. The team may reach out to guide you on return shipping.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So I just sit and wait?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: For now, yes. But I’ll keep you updated.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Is there a store I can take it to instead?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You can, but they will also submit it to the technical team.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: This is so frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand completely. I wish I could resolve it right now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So you can’t fix it today?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Unfortunately not today, but I promise to expedite the process.
